resources.string: Main hero of the Mushroom Kingdom, brave and charismatic.
Marios brother, intelligent, agile, and somewhat shy.
Princess of the Mushroom Kingdom, brave and always kind.
Resident of the Mushroom Kingdom, loyal friend, and swift helper.
Expert in precision jumps, unmatched strength, and bravery. Can throw fireballs, use suits with special powers, and always leads heroic missions.
Jumps higher than Mario, cautious, and creative in solving problems. Uses his special vacuum to hunt ghosts and is known for his agility.
Can glide through the air thanks to her special dress. Skilled in strategies, with magical powers and a firm will to defend the Mushroom Kingdom.
Extremely fast and agile. Has surprising strength for his size, and is highly reliable in races or support missions in the Mushroom Kingdom.
